overview: Sathya (Navdeep), Guru (Abhinay) and Sathyan (Sathyan) are friends. Anjali (Sara Alambra), Meghna (Suja), Radhika (Madhumitha) and Anu (Mallika Kapoor) come in Sathya's life. The complication that arises, the tussle with Bhadri Narayanan (Prakash Raj) form the rest of the movie.
title: Solla Solla Inikkum
